message.content: {"id": "18268", "title": "Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories", "description": "Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories. To reproduce: 1. Start Eclipse. 2. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif. 3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif'. 4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif'. 5. Open the about dialog. Observations: There is a main image again. This suggests that the UI correctly passes the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but the '$nl$' path segment is not handled correctly.", "OB": "", "EB": "To reproduce: 1. Start Eclipse. 2. Open the about dialog. Observations: There is no main image. Expectation: It should have found it in step 6.", "SR": "To resolve: 1. Exit Eclipse. 2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif down into an NL-specific subdirectory, i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif. 3. Start Eclipse again."}

Open the about dialogObserve: There is a main image again.This suggests that the UI is correctly passing the entire pathto IPluginDescriptor.find, but that the "$nl$" path segment is not beinghandled correctly. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Open the about dialogObserve: There is no main image.Expectation: It should have found it in.6. ', 'SR': 'Exit eclipse.1. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gifdown into an NLspecific subdirectory; i.e., move it to<install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif2. Start eclipse5. Start eclipse8. '}
